desc.0: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Trick of Fate</ct> hits an enemy or Hugo's attacks Stun an enemy, Hugo gains the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dark Abyss Reverb</ct> state for 6s, and repeated triggers reset the duration. During this state, Hugo's CRIT Rate increases by 12% and CRIT DMG increases by 25%.
desc.1: When there are 1/2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Stun</ct> characters in your squad, Hugo's ATK increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>25</ct>/<ct color=#2BAD00>75</ct>.
desc.2: When the Finishing Move of <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Soul Hunter - Punishment</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Blaspheme</ct> hits an enemy while they are Stunned, it triggers the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Totalize</ct> effect, increasing the DMG Multiplier of the skill's Finishing Move by <ct color=#2BAD00>500%</ct>. Additionally, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Totalize</ct> effect further increases the skill's DMG multiplier based on the remaining Stun time of the enemy when triggered: for each remaining second of Stun time from the portion that is less than or equal to 5s, the skill's DMG multiplier increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>140%</ct>; for each remaining second of Stun time from the portion between 5 and 15s, the skill's DMG multiplier increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>50%</ct>. The total increase can raise the skill's DMG multiplier by a maximum of <ct color=#2BAD00>1,700%</ct>.
desc.3: After Hugo triggers the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Totalize</ct> effect, the enemy's Stunned state will immediately end. Based on the remaining Stun time at the moment <ct color=#FFFFFF>Totalize</ct> is triggered, a certain amount of Daze will be accumulated. For every second of Stun time remaining, 5% Daze is accumulated, up to a maximum Daze equivalent to 25% of the enemy's maximum Daze.
desc.4: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Soul Hunter - Punishment</ct> hits an enemy, if the enemy is not Stunned, the Daze accumulated by the skill increases by 20%.

1.name: Child of Hatred
1.desc: When triggering the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Totalize</ct> effect in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dark Abyss Reverb</ct> state, the skill's CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 12%, and CRIT DMG by 30%.

flavor.0: "So, do not deny your own desires, do not resist your own ambition. This is the talent you were born with, the best gift fate has ever given you!"
flavor.1: "Admit it, deep within your heart lies a spark, yearning to ignite a raging inferno that will burn everything down—"

2.name: The Child Within
2.desc: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Blaspheme</ct> triggers <ct color=#FFFFFF>Totalize</ct>, it will not end the enemy's Stunned state. Additionally, when <ct color=#FFFFFF>Totalize</ct> is triggered, the skill will ignore 15% of the enemy's DEF.

flavor.0: "Family is an everlasting, unavoidable curse placed upon a person."
flavor.1: "No matter how much you grow, no matter where you go, that curse will forever follow you like a shadow."
flavor.2: "When you fall to rock bottom or climb to your peak, it will appear, turning you back into that helpless, powerless child who can do nothing but hide in the closet and weep."
flavor.4: "Unless you truly see him, embrace him."
flavor.5: Some pain can only be healed when it is seen and accepted.

3.name: Fruit of the Poisonous Tree
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: They say that the flowers that bloom in the abyss are always soaked in malice, just like how a poisonous tree can't bear safe fruit.
flavor.2: So, he broke himself into a rain of shattered pieces.
flavor.3: The rain covered the earth, and each dewdrop reflected a fresh new dawn.

4.name: Dramatic Theory
4.desc: After a Charged Shot hits an enemy, Hugo's attacks against that target will ignore 12% of that target's <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</ct> for 15s, repeated triggers reset the duration.

flavor.0: Justice, evil, madness, reason, charm, stubbornness.
flavor.3: "That's not important. How about, instead, you tell me, Lycaon—"
flavor.4: "What kind of person do you see in me?"

5.name: Nirvana
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: The world doesn't need to be destroyed and rebuilt, and no one has the right to do such.
flavor.2: So, he shattered himself and was reborn.
flavor.3: "If I must fall, let me fall. The person I am meant to become will surely catch me."

6.name: Crown of Thorns
6.desc: All shooting attacks that hit enemies trigger the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dark Abyss Reverb</ct> state, lasting up to 6s, and repeated triggers reset the duration. Additionally, whenever any skill triggers the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Totalize</ct> effect, that DMG is further increased by 60%. The Finishing Move of <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Soul Hunter - Punishment</ct> also triggers the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Totalize</ct> effect when hitting an enemy that isn't Stunned, boosting the DMG multiplier of the Finishing Move by a fixed 1,000 %.

flavor.0: He walked willingly toward the endless abyss, letting the thorns on the ground tear at his wounds.
flavor.1: Where the blood spread, broken dignity and stubbornness began to sprout from the wounds.
flavor.2: He picked up the blood-soaked thorns to crown himself.
flavor.3: "There's only ever been one person who can kill me or save me... And that is me."
